name: Metro Bear
description:

  • Previous 1 hour game

You're a bear masquerading as a normal person in a metro station full of tasty people (also masquerading as normal persons) and you try to eat as many people as possible before they discover the bodies.

^The request

This game was made in 1 hour. I was inspired by "Among us" for this one. GMS2 source is included if you want to make my game better.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow keys: move
  • Spacebar/shift/left mouse button: eat
  • R: restart
  • F4: fullscreen (windows only)
